sourcesContent:
import { Box, Stack, Text } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import {Link } from "react-router-dom"; import DetailedPalette from './DetailedPalette'; import { useState } from 'react'; const Palette = ({ palette }) => { const [selected, setSelected] = useState({ zero: 'Friday', one : '#eccc68', two : '#ff7f50', three : '#ff6b81', four : '#ffa502', five : '#ff6348', six : '#ff4757', seven : '#7bed9f', eight : '#70a1ff', nine : '#5352ed' }) return (
{palette.zero}
); } export default Palette;
